mapper.insert:
insert into oms_order_item ( id, order_id, sku_id, title, bar_code, data, main_picture, price, quantity ) values
( #{orderItem.id}, #{orderItem.orderId}, #{orderItem.skuId}, #{orderItem.title}, #{orderItem.barCode},#{orderItem.data}, #{orderItem.mainPicture}, #{orderItem.price}, #{orderItem.quantity} )
